Reviews.Title: Great peformance for a low price
Reviews.Author: That Guy from Seattle
Reviews.Content: I bought this at a local retailer for about $25 over the Amazon price. Normally I'd fuss with shipping but I was there, killing time, the TV was there... Why not?Let's face it: These days no one is drooling over 720p or a measly 32 inches. Even so for me this TV replaces an ancient 27 inch CRT I had which wasn't broken but I figured I wanted something a little bigger, more efficient, and HD capable in some capacity. The manual specifications list power consumption at about 52-53 watts which isn't bad. Not quite at LED backlit levels but at this price it's very respectable.Unpacking and setup is very simple and JVC even includes a screw driver for attaching the stand. The front mounted speakers aren't anything special: They get the job done but that's about it. Fortunately the TV has audio out options if you want to pair it with bigger speakers. The input/output jacks are good for a relatively low cost unit: 2x HDMI, 1x VGA, a USB port, and a smattering of various other ports including a slough of composite ins/outs. If you're looking to use some crazy home theater Dolby 7.x+ setup then... Well then you're probably looking at multi-grand 50+ inch displays so you aren't even reading this review. The buttons on the unit are recessed onto the back end of the left side as is the USB port. They are easy enough to reach in general but you can't see them or the labels depending on how you have the unit setup so this could be a nice perk or a problem. Otherwise the remote gets the job done for everything else.The image quality is good with no artifacts or ghosting during fast action. Overall brightness isn't bad but other manufacturers have better offerings in this department. Color reproduction seems good and blacks are deep and uniform. This TV also has an ambient light sensor that is used to adjust the back light brightness dynamically depending on the light in the room and the brightness of the image. It's a decent enough effect but there is a noticable half second latency when the TV adjusts the backlighting for a scene change or turning on a light in the room. Fortunately this function can be turned off easily if it bothers you.Overall this is a solid set at a good price. Colors are good, contrast is good, and input options are outstanding for a lower end model.Pros:- Good price- Easy setup, intuitive menu system- Free screw driver in the box- 2x HDMI, 1x VGA, composite, USB connector, lots of audio input/output optionsCons:- Stand has a large footprint but is still somewhat flimsy feeling- 720p might be a problem for some- Brightness is a bit on the low end- Adaptive backlight level feature has a lag time but it can be turned off completely if desired- It makes local TV news anchors look like entirely new people and some may frighten you in HD vs. SD

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV for the Price
Reviews.Author: Mary C
Reviews.Content: I did a ton of research and wound up with this TV due to it's decent speaker wattage (10 watts per speaker, 20 total) so I wouldn't have to get a sound bar to hear it, and also because it got good reviews around the 'net.  I bought it without seeing it demonstrated in a store.  After having it for a few weeks, I'm very pleased with it.  Good sound and good picture, after a bit of tinkering with settings.  This set has no motion lag issues I've noticed on any films or sports I've viewed on it so far.  High definition broadcasts and streaming video look vivid and detailed on this set, and it handles standard definition stations and sources very well.  I've also used it as a computer monitor by hooking up to a laptop via HDMI, and not only does video look good, text is very sharp and readable.Another plus for this JVC TV is that it has a QAM tuner (some brands do not, you have to check on their website specs to see whether or not they do). With the QAM tuner, I can get the local TV stations in high definition via cable TV without having to use a cable box.  My cable company charges extra for high def. versions of the local stations; I'd have to rent a more expensive box from them and pay more money every month. This TV makes it possible to avoid paying that extra fee and yet still get those high def. stations in HDTV form. I also like that this TV has a wide 180 degree viewing angle. The picture is good even without sitting in a direct line with the front of the set.

Reviews.Title: Very nice, inexpensive set with an added surprise
Reviews.Author: J. Rose "JR From the Ball so Blue"
Reviews.Content: Bought last season's Samsung LED tv @ Costco. Got it home only to have issues setting it up.Called Samsung only to be told "we don't do audio out on anything smaller than 40 inches".Smug tone. Gooey condescension.Needless to say I won't buy Samsung again.Called Costco and got a lovely fellow named Johnny. He pointed me to this very beautiful set.It is missing a few of the higher end features, but it does a terrific job with my pre-HDMI stereo, Wii connected via component cables, and the PS3 via HDMI. Even has a wider variety of video presets  and a customizable one.I don't miss the online information the Samsung had.The audio only feature is a boon. I listen to music on my set each night and one simple button press and presto, a darkened screen.The added surprise was the free Phillips head screwdriver included in the box. A nice touch.It's $50 cheaper at Costco right now (May 2012).

Reviews.Title: Bargain at $230. Great picture, sound only OK
Reviews.Author: Paul Lockwood "Paul Lockwood"
Reviews.Content: Bought with 180 degree wall mount for a home gym.Does not support auto-switch to new source etc that more expensive TVs do. Sound is good but not great.Still, fed from a Kindle Fire HD the picture looks great and this TV only draws 35->45 watts (Kill-a-watt verified). In the event of power outage this thing will run for hours off my UPS so it has dual purpose as a TV when the power goes out.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the money
Reviews.Author: CM Book Review
Reviews.Content: This TV is awesome! I am really happy with this purchase. The picture is crisp, it was a breeze to set up, and it works great for what we needed it for (playroom).

Reviews.Title: Junk
Reviews.Author: Chuck, Naperville, Il
Reviews.Content: I bought 2 jvc tvs in Jan. 2012 from Amazon, both tvs went dead in Feb. 2013, JVC service was no help,they told me it was not covered by anything.

Reviews.Title: GREAT TV!
Reviews.Author: hondais1
Reviews.Content: Replaced all our TVs with HD and bought this one for our bedroom. It has a beautiful picture and we got it at a great price. Quick delivery too.

Reviews.Title: JVC JLC32BC3002 32-Inch 720p 60Hz LCD TV
Reviews.Author: P. DeWitt
Reviews.Content: I ordered this on Black Friday 2012.  The price was $229 - shipped.  However, Walmart had the same TV for $30 less.  I contacted Amazon, and they credited me the difference that night.I received the TV within 5 days.  Setup was simple. As mentioned in other reviews, JVC includes a screwdriver to assemble the base to the TV.  The buttons on the remote seem to be well laid out, although the cable remote is used.I wasn't sure about the 720p resolution when I ordered it.  I assumed there would be a big difference in picture quality between this and my 42" LG 1080p.  I have to say, that I cannot tell much of a difference in picture quality between the two.  The picture on the JVC is crisp and clear, with vivid color.  Power consumption is quite low as well.The wife is happy with it, and that is enough for me!

Reviews.Title: great deal
Reviews.Author: L. GRAY "lgrayut"
Reviews.Content: Quick delivery. The picture is clear and bright. This is for my daughter's room. It is the perfect size.Also bought the wall mount. Quick easy set up. Great buy for the price.

Reviews.Title: 32" HD TV's
Reviews.Author: C. Donald Murphy
Reviews.Content: The JVC 32" 720 p TV is a very good product, mounting the base stand was easy and they include a screwdriver. I also mounted one to a wall mount that I purchased and that was very easy as well. Both TV's have an excellent picture. Would recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Great picture and audio at a low price
Reviews.Author: Robert Lyon
Reviews.Content: Met my expectations with it's 2 10 watt speaker Dolby audio. Would recommended highly. Low price, picture and audio quality, what more could you want.

Reviews.Title: USB Port will only play photos
Reviews.Author: Yo daddy "Don't blame me, I'm just the messen...
Reviews.Content: It's so conveinent to carry my movies around on a USB flash drive, so I wanted a TV with USB support. On the JVC website, the fancy emblem for their "USB feature" clearly shows a camera (photo) headphones (music) and filmstrip (movies). It also came printed on the box. I was disappointed to find that it varies from model to model and this unit will only display pictures. It will not play avi, mpg, wmv files or mp3 files. However the picture is great, and the sound is best I've heard from a TV of this size, so I'll guess I'll be keeping it.

Reviews.Title: A beautiful set
Reviews.Author: Joey
Reviews.Content: I have bought a lot of JVC products in the past. They have always worked great for me and cosmetically they look fantastic.

Reviews.Title: Lasted less than one year
Reviews.Author: Alder Farm
Reviews.Content: Less than one year after purchase, the television stopped coming on. Period.  No trouble shooting steps suggested in the manual have remedied the siutation.

Reviews.Title: JVC TV
Reviews.Author: Presley L.White
Reviews.Content: Bought this tv for my bedroom. It is just what I wanted works great. I had JVC products before always happy with the products.

Reviews.Title: JVC 32" Flat Screen LCD TV meets claims and expectations
Reviews.Author: jlb
Reviews.Content: Excellent picture quality--I've become something of a critic when I see other tv sets.  I also appreciate the above average power of the audio (as advertised.)  Overall a very big step up from my old CRT  tv.  I unhesitatingly recommend this tv to anyone shopping for a new flat screen.

Reviews.Title: AMAZING!
Reviews.Author: ms
Reviews.Content: I needed to upgrade from a 22inch which was in my dorm room for the past couple of years. I thought about going bigger with a 42 inch however, I am glad I wound up with this one. It is the perfect size and has a great picture. No regrets. Great quality. And I use an hdmi cable w/my laptop all the time.

Reviews.Title: Great Xtra TV
Reviews.Author: Judy D. Ussery
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV as a gift for my husband. He wanted one to put outdoors when he was grilling so he wouldn't miss football games. This one is great for just that reason. We haven't used it much yet because our cable tv wasn't set up correctly but now that we have that corrected I expect to get a lot more of my meals grilled!

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: Meteoro
Reviews.Content: Bought it for the kids rooms. Can't go wrong with the price. Picture quality is decent. Looks good from the get go, did not need to make much adjustments.

Reviews.Title: great tv for the price
Reviews.Author: John K
Reviews.Content: bought this tv for my bedroom and it worked great right out of the box. great picture and color and the light sensor makes viewing perfect when i shut the lights off.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for our Bedroom!
Reviews.Author: Natalie Stubblefield
Reviews.Content: We bought this TV specifically foe our bedroom & it's the perfect fit! Good quality.. we are very pleased with it!

Reviews.Title: Nice TV's, but missing some minor parts and remote didn't work on one of them
Reviews.Author: Maverick56
Reviews.Content: Nice picture and sound, and the delivery from Amazon of both TV's was prompt. One TV was missing a part to secure the base to the stand, and the other TV's remote didn't work. Fortunately I was able to use one remote that worked for both TV's, and the stand worked but wasn't secured without the missing part. After contacting JVC customer service, which was not easy...long wait on hold, and struggling to get through the service call with rep whose English was very hard to understand, I did finally get the missing parts and remote sent to me about 10 days later.Had it not have been for the parts, remote, and service call issue, I would have given this product a 5 star rating.

Reviews.Title: Great T V
Reviews.Author: Jerry Trull
Reviews.Content: This is a great t v at a great price. I bought this as a gift and he couldn't  be happier.I would highly recommend this item and the service was great!

Reviews.Title: Good buy for the money
Reviews.Author: Craig Bueschel
Reviews.Content: Easy set up with free screwdriVer provided. Good picture quality, but sound is a bit lacking in bass and depth. Dropped remote from 18 inches off floor onto carpet and battery door tabs snapped offWhich was fixed with tape. All in All what i expected for the price. Still -- not dissatisfied so far. Have been enjoying the holiday withour new JVC.

Reviews.Title: The Best TV For Your Bedroom
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: GREAt reception,sound & color. I shopped around & researched many brands. This one is the best. Great price & shipping. It even beat ALL Black Friday Deals !

Reviews.Title: Great Tv
Reviews.Author: Sandra Myers
Reviews.Content: Got this for Christmas..couldn't wait to open...easy set up...great picture...well worth the money...would buy another one ...def will recommend ...

Reviews.Title: Good deal, good product
Reviews.Author: Leslie A Perry
Reviews.Content: Comparison shopped online. Decided to stay with JVC since I had been pleased with my old TV. Got a good price. I'm not savvy with electronics, but I was able to follow the set up instructions. Yea!  Good picture, good sound. I'm happy.

Reviews.Title: Very happy with the JVC JLC32B
Reviews.Author: El
Reviews.Content: Very happy with the JVC JLC32B. Excellent quality TV for the price. I would definitely recommend this product to anyone looking for a TV this size.

Reviews.Title: Picture Perfect
Reviews.Author: shortyv380
Reviews.Content: I really enjoy watching my shows on this tv. We have it mounted in the bedroom and it's a perfect size.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price.
Reviews.Author: Markus T.
Reviews.Content: I use standard cable on the set.  The picture is great as long as the broad cast is not 480p.  When I use my Blu-Ray interned connected player the picture is perfect.  So, if you have this set and are using HD cable, HD Sat, or a good internet connected device, you will love it.  Just one more note great sound!

Reviews.Title: I think its a good set for the money
Reviews.Author: Cuzin It
Reviews.Content: I got this TV and I like it. I think is a good buy for the money. I am not a TV junkie so I don't know about the fine points of TVs these days. It was easy to set up and has a lot of inputs and outputs. I purchased this TV to watch over the air broadcast and to use as a monitor. As far as I'm concerned it does a good job on both.

Reviews.Title: GREAT TELEVISION
Reviews.Author: Brian Quinlan
Reviews.Content: I love the picture and the sound. My last tv was an old box set and the speakers rattled, etc... This flat screen tv is a very nice tv. I guess some people have to have 1080p but the 720p has been very nice to look at. I haven't adjusted any settings on it. The picture is perfect. The sound is perfect. The price is incredible considering the cost of a flat screen 2 years ago.

Reviews.Title: Buy This Television!
Reviews.Author: Russell Nordgren
Reviews.Content: JVC 32 inch LCD TV - Great price!  Vibrant colors! Sharp picture!  Ambient light sensor. Awesome product at a great value.

Reviews.Title: Good Value and Good Quality
Reviews.Author: AustinDevinAriana
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV about one month ago when it was $229.  I use it in our Master Bedroom.  So far I find it to be a good value, and the picture quality is very good.  I don't think 1080p makes any noticeable difference at this TV size, as suggested by experts online.  I use Directv and noticed on at least one channel that there seems to be a slight gap at the top of the screen.  I can get rid of this by changing the viewing mode, however.  Overall, I'm pleased with this purchase after one month and would recommend this TV to someone looking for a basic, low-cost 32 inch TV.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV!
Reviews.Author: Mario Macca
Reviews.Content: Wow what a deal for our bedroom TV.  I think we paid about $230 when all was said and done.  Placed it on a wall mount and it looks great.  Sound is good, picture is exceptional.  I have been buying Samsung units and very happy with their quality of picture, but the JVC is as close or better.  You will not be disappointed with this unit.

Reviews.Title: Fabulous TV/Amazon's Amazing Price & Cust. Service
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I purchased this on Wenesday for my BFF for Christmas. I actually have a 47 inch JVC which I love. Frankly at 229$ this was a bargain. It will arrive on Monday. I just noticed the price had dropped to $199.00 WOW!!!!!! so I just called Amazon and they credited me 29.99, because of their low price guarantee. The price & the quality of JVC is amazing. Of course I am going on my 47 inch, which is stunning, rich, the sound is crazy loud(no sound bar needed) and I just love it. Since my BFF needs a tv really bad, she will love this. I of course will purchase a SQUARE TRADE WARRANTY. I have square trade on my dvd players, my copy machine, 2 cameras, my new tablet and two tvs. When my dvd player quit playing regions 2(multi region player) they paid for it to be shipped back, it was repaired & shipped back to me, all this within 5 days. If it wouldn't have been repairable they give you ALL YOUR MONEY BACK. It is a great program, and frankly after having to Nokia cameras just quit, I would rather pay 20$ for 2 years of protection. I have never paid more then 49$ for 2-4 years of protection.

Reviews.Title: Great TV Great Price
Reviews.Author: Beermonster
Reviews.Content: Using this tv mainly for PS3, picture is great, all the inputs I need.  I did hook it up to a cheapo set top antenna and it found a bunch if channels, picture was great there also.Got this onsale Thanksgiving weekend, definitely a steal!

Reviews.Title: Problems, it starts in Audio mode only
Reviews.Author: Bugle M Ranch
Reviews.Content: Right out of the box when we would start the TV it was in Audio Only mode, everytime.  We would hit the power button and then the little JVC window pops up momentarily (so I knew the video worked) and then the sound comes on but no picture.  We had to hit the Audio button to get video.  This is not normal. I thought maybe it was the Home Mode or Display Mode in a store and that didn't fix it.I was going to return it but thought maybe I should call JVC first.  She had me go through a bunch of commands and nothing worked.  Then she said to hit the menu button, then type in 2489.  Another secret programming menu popped up.  She had me hit Clean Storage or something.  Once I did that the TV went blank and turned off.  When I turned it on I could see it was on but no sound, no picture. The buttons on remote were unresponsive.  I think she wiped the memory and she definitely made it worse.  I will be returning it now.One other thing, I thought the picture was very dark compared to our other LCD TV's.  It has an ambient light setting and I did not turn that off to see what effect it would have.Overall it didn't work and the picture was dark.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Joao
Reviews.Content: very good price value, very good price value verygood price valuevery good price value, very good price value, very good

Reviews.Title: Good TV
Reviews.Author: nellie
Reviews.Content: Good TV, but, I don't have cable, dish etc.  I just use rabbit ears for reception, so the JVC didn't pick up as many stations as other TVs
